last_episode_to_air.name: Pedestrian traffic lights
last_episode_to_air.overview: Lucio is going to teach us the importance of pedestrian traffic lights and also what we should do when we see one. Victor isn’t quite clear about it and we will see what happens when he doesn’t pay attention to the explanations and crosses the street without paying attention to Lucio’s cousins.

name: Green Light
overview: How do you have to cross the street? How do you have to go by bicycle? Those, and many other basic rules of Road Safety, will be taught to the youngest, by a master-police officer and his inseparable Lucio, with visual examples of what happens if things are done well and what happens if they are done badly.
